page.title: 13SPORTS CLUBS.
page.content: For people who want to play sport they can do{badminton, tennis, cricket}in our area. There is a youth{football team as well. The{badminton}is played at{Doulting}School in the winter mainly. People come from{Doulting, {Cranmore, Evercreech}and{Shepton {Mallet.}For{tennis}there is a court marked on the car park at{Doulting School and in{Cranmore}there are some {tennis}courts next to the{cricket club, but these are being repaired. The cricket is played at{Cranmore where they play on Saturday, Sunday and sometimes during the week. On Saturdays they play in the{Somerset {Cricket League.}The 1st XI are in Division III and the 2nd XI play in the 2nd XI League in Division 4. Cranmore also have a Youth Cricket Team. The youth{football}team use the cricket ground to play football.
